title: Summoner's Rift in winter
body:
hei,
I just want to see the old winter map again- perfected and ajar to the new Summoner's Rift !{{summoner:6}}

replies.body:
I wonder what snow looks like with the new washed out and dull design. Some things shouldn't be touched.

The old one was very nice though despite missing improvements, it just popped.

I really hope riot decides to make or are working on it. But one thing is for sure, the theme music for winter map was so good that it should not be changed. Its just whenever i look up that soundtrack, It brings back so much good memories, when i started playing league .
